name: World Cup USA '94 [SCD]
description:
World Cup USA '94 is a sports game developed by Tiertex Design Studios, U.S. Gold and Tiertex. It came out on 01-01-1994. It was published by U.S. Gold. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play World Cup USA '94 on SNES, Commodore / Amiga, SEGA CD and SEGA Master System.
